snippet: The London Games will be tweeted, tagged, liked, blogged, mashed and rehashed as no other Games have been.
abstract: London Olympics will have a much larger presence on social media than any of the previous games, reflecting the spread of smartphones and the surging popularity of sites like Facebook and Twitter; organizers and advertisers are embracing the trend with several social media initiatives.
lead_paragraph: The London Games will be tweeted, tagged, liked, blogged, mashed and rehashed as no other Games have been.

headline.main: Social Media Is the Message for Olympics
headline.print_headline: Social Media’s Role in London Games Grows With Surge in Users
